definition: "Zu" is a short word that is commonly used as a preposition in German. It typically indicates a direction or movement towards a specific location or target. Additionally, it can also convey the meaning of "to" or "at" when used in certain contexts. This word is frequently employed in various phrases and expressions to express the idea of going somewhere or reaching a particular destination.

examples.english: I am going to my girlfriend.

examples.german: Er hat keine Zeit, zu kommen.
examples.english: He doesn't have time to come.

examples.german: Ich habe keine Lust, zu arbeiten.
